mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderInfo (id,member_id,price,payment,time,payment_status, order_num, order_status, paymenthash) VALUES (#{id},#{member_id},#{price},#{payment},#{time},#{payment_status}, #{order_num}, #{order_status}, #{paymenthash})
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM orderInfo WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE orderInfo SET payment_status = #{payment_status}, paymenthash = #{paymenthash} where id = #{id}
